content: any st in round 4 surface slip_stitch along each st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 48 surface sl sts 16 roun d 7 sand note be careful not to catch your surface slip stitches in this round join in the 2nd half_double_crochet of any 6hdc of round 4 ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st 1sc in each of the next 4sts fptrc around the top of the dc3tog from round 3 you will be workin g over the surface slip_stitch skip st 1sc in each of the next 5sts fptrc around the top of the dc3tog from round 3 7 times skip st join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 8fptrc 40sc 17 roun d 8 golden yellow note don t work your chains too tightly in this round join in the 1st single_crochet of any 5sc ch2 decrease over the next 2sts this counts as the 1st dc3tog ch3 dc3tog over the next 3sts ch3 15 times join to the top of the beginning dc3tog with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 16 dc3tog 16 ch3-spaces 18 roun d 9 golden yellow slip_stitch in to the 1st ch3-space ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 4hdc in the same space work 5hdc in each of the next 15 ch3-sps join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 80hdc round 10 - marigold join ar ound any post of any st in round 9 surface slip_stitch along each st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 80 surface sl sts 19 roun d 11 sand note be careful not to catch your surface slip stitches in this round join in the 2nd half_double_crochet of any 5hdc from round 9 ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st 1sc in each of the next 3sts fptrc around the top of the dc3tog from round 8 skip st 1sc in each of the next 4sts fptrc around the top of the dc3tog from round 8 15 times skip st join to the top of the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 16 fptrc 64sc 80sts round 12 golden yellow note don t work your chains too tightly in this round join in any st ch2 dc3tog over the next 3sts this counts as the 1st dc4tog ch4 dc4tog over the next 4sts ch4 19 times join to the top of the beginning dc4tog with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 20 dc4tog 20 ch4-spaces 20 roun d 13 golden yellow slip_stitch in to the ch4-space ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 5hdc in the same space work 6hdc in each of the next 19 ch4-sps join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 120hdc round 14 marigold join ar ound the post of any st
